channel.title: Network Addon Mod on
channel.description: Recent content in Network Addon Mod on

item.title: Download the NAM
item.description: Compatibility Notice - EA App and Origin Copies of SimCity 4 Deluxe NOW COMPATIBLE with the Network Addon Mod Digital copies of SimCity 4 Deluxe purchased via EA.com, the EA App, or the Origin Store have been patched to Version 1.1.641 as of 1 June 2023, and are now fully compatible with the Network Addon Mod. The same is true if playing the game via an EA Play or Xbox Game Pass subscription.
